class.name: VisualShaderNodeComment
class.deprecated: This class has no function anymore and only exists for compatibility.
class.brief_description: Only exists for compatibility. Use [VisualShaderNodeFrame] as a replacement.
class.description: This node was replaced by [VisualShaderNodeFrame] and only exists to preserve compatibility. In the [VisualShader] editor it behaves exactly like [VisualShaderNodeFrame].

members.member: This property only exists to preserve data authored in earlier versions of Godot. It has currently no function.
